tool_description: Identifies content gaps and underserved topics within a niche by analyzing competitor content coverage and audience demand patterns.

niche.description: Content niche or industry vertical to analyze

competitors.description: Competitor accounts or brands to analyze

platform.description: Platform for gap analysis (instagram, tiktok, youtube, linkedin, twitter)

error_messages: Invalid niche specification: Provide a specific niche or industry vertical.
Insufficient competitors: Minimum 2 competitors required, maximum 15 allowed.
Unsupported platform: Use one of [instagram, tiktok, youtube, linkedin, twitter].
Invalid analysis depth: Use one of [surface, moderate, deep].
Competitors not found: Some specified competitors could not be analyzed.
Niche too broad: Provide a more specific niche for accurate gap analysis.
usage: Specify niche, competitors array, and platform. Optionally set analysis_depth and timeframe. Returns identified content gaps with opportunity scores.

content_gaps.description: Identified underserved topics and content gaps

opportunity_scores.description: Opportunity scores (0-100) for each identified gap

competition_levels.description: Competition level (low, medium, high) for each gap

suggested_content_types.description: Recommended content formats for each gap

audience_demand.description: Estimated audience demand (low, medium, high) for each gap
